author: ThOliveira23
body:
**PR description:**

At the python configuration file there are some modifications in the values for pT, mass range and PU and the change of the trigger (from HLT_IsoMu_27 to HLT_IsoMu_24), concerning the preparation for Run3.


At the plugins, the definition of a Custom Tight ID for the muon, with no consideration of the primary vertices quantities. Also a bug fixing. 

**PR validation:**

Compilation of the cmssw.
A test using the DQMOffline/Lumi/test/ZCounting_cfg.py to produce the root file.

**if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:**

There isnt a backport intended.
title: Code maintenance and preparation for Run III in the DQMOffline ZCounting
